text: I could sense that this foul magic was near...

text: The Blueheart will envelop them all.

name: cm_wolf_item_004
text: Boots blessed by my own breath.

name: cm_wolf_item_005
text: Why must I make this wicked trade?
text_simple: why must i make this wicked trade

text: What finds this so far from hell?
text_simple: what finds this so far from hell

name: cm_wolf_item_009
text: The echoes of the black king's reign will ring until the end of time.
text_simple: the echoes of the black kings reign will ring until the end of time

text: In the cold they will find silence.
text_simple: in the cold they will find silence

name: cm_wolf_item_013
text: To overcome the constraints of this form.
text_simple: to overcome the constraints of this form

name: cm_wolf_item_018
text: I suppose they have earned it.

name: cm_wolf_item_026
text: The drums of war will sound across the ice plains.
text_simple: the drums of war will sound across the ice plains

name: cm_wolf_item_044
text: Into the eye of an ice storm...
text_simple: into the eye of an ice storm

name: cm_wolf_item_046
text: I've seen this staff in a student's hand...
text_simple: ive seen this staff in a students hand

name: cm_wolf_item_047
text: Natural or no, a strange pairing.
text_simple: natural or no a strange pairing

name: cm_wolf_item_048
text: I must grant, it is a useful trick.
text_simple: i must grant it is a useful trick

name: cm_wolf_item_050
text: A value far beyond its price.
text_simple: a value far beyond its price

text: All can share in this bounty.

text: It will be the edge we need.

text: None would expect this... Not even me.

text: These will show the path to victory.
text_simple: these will show the path to victory

text: We must never reveal our plans.

text: I claim the Eye of Skadi.

name: cm_wolf_item_081
text: A fine sphere. Wasted on its creator.
text_simple: a fine sphere wasted on its creator

name: cm_wolf_item_084
text: Even I have ever more to learn.
text_simple: even i have ever more to learn

name: cm_wolf_item_085
text: Perhaps I should pen a tome.
text_simple: perhaps i should pen a tome

name: cm_wolf_item_086
text: We thank those who share their knowledge.
text_simple: we thank those who share their knowledge

name: cm_wolf_item_106
text: Boots of Bearing. Yet I bear them...
text_simple: boots of bearing yet i bear them

name: cm_wolf_item_108
text: A sad tale. But not mine to tell.
text_simple: a sad tale but not mine to tell

name: cm_wolf_kill_02
text: The Blueheart will grow to cover your bones.
text_simple: the blueheart will grow to cover your bones

name: cm_wolf_kill_03
text: You've won nothing by coming here.
text_simple: youve won nothing by coming here

name: cm_wolf_kill_06
text: You cannot begin to test me.
text_simple: you cannot begin to test me

name: cm_wolf_kill_07
text_simple: i have taught you your limitations

name: cm_wolf_kill_08
text: Close your eyes and surrender to the cold.
text_simple: close your eyes and surrender to the cold

name: cm_wolf_kill_09
text: Fear not, child. Your shame will soon be forgotten.
text_simple: fear not child your shame will soon be forgotten

name: cm_wolf_kill_10
text: I do not take pleasure in your death. But it does not bring me sorrow.
text_simple: i do not take pleasure in your death but it does not bring me sorrow

name: cm_wolf_kill_11
text: Your last words also died quickly, against the howling wind.
text_simple: your last words also died quickly against the howling wind

name: cm_wolf_kill_14
text: I will not insult you by pretending to care.
text_simple: i will not insult you by pretending to care

name: cm_wolf_kill_15
text: This would have been even worse for you on the elemental plane.
text_simple: this would have been even worse for you on the elemental plane

name: cm_wolf_lasthit_01
text: I strike with purpose. Not for gold.
text_simple: i strike with purpose not for gold

name: cm_wolf_lasthit_02
text: I've not had need of treasure before...
text_simple: ive not had need of treasure before

name: cm_wolf_lasthit_04
text: Like a babe lost in the snow.
text_simple: like a babe lost in the snow

name: cm_wolf_laugh_04
text: Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha haa
text_simple: ha ha ha ha ha ha ha haa

name: cm_wolf_laugh_05
text: Ah ha ha ha ha ha haa ha
text_simple: ah ha ha ha ha ha haa ha

name: cm_wolf_laugh_06
text: Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha haa
text_simple: ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha haa

name: cm_wolf_levelup_01
text: I seek not this power. Only the knowledge whence it flows...
text_simple: i seek not this power only the knowledge whence it flows

name: cm_wolf_levelup_02
text: I unlock memories of a former age...
text_simple: i unlock memories of a former age

name: cm_wolf_levelup_05
text: I prepare myself to smother this land.
text_simple: i prepare myself to smother this land

name: cm_wolf_levelup_08
text: And still we push for more.
text_simple: and still we push for more

name: cm_wolf_levelup_10
text: Each day I walk this land, I recollect more and more.
text_simple: each day i walk this land i recollect more and more

name: cm_wolf_levelup_12
text: The frost will rime their souls.
text_simple: the frost will rime their souls

name: cm_wolf_levelup_13
text: We seek power not for glory, only for need.
text_simple: we seek power not for glory only for need

name: cm_wolf_levelup_14
text: We must choose our focus wisely...
text_simple: we must choose our focus wisely

name: cm_wolf_levelup_15
text: Where does the icewind blow us?
text_simple: where does the icewind blow us

name: cm_wolf_lose_03
text: Until the next break of winter...
text_simple: until the next break of winter

name: cm_wolf_lose_04
text: The heart of the glacier crumbles...
text_simple: the heart of the glacier crumbles

name: cm_wolf_lose_06
text: This loss threatens even the elemental plane...
text_simple: this loss threatens even the elemental plane

name: cm_wolf_monologue_a_02
text: Through which all frost magics of the world flow.
text_simple: through which all frost magics of the world flow

name: cm_wolf_monologue_a_03
text: Only when a worthy student rises...
text_simple: only when a worthy student rises

name: cm_wolf_monologue_a_04
text: Might I materialize to step from Blueheart's core.
text_simple: might i materialize to step from bluehearts core

name: cm_wolf_monologue_a_05
text: To choose one who must carry the secret burden of the living.
text_simple: to choose one who must carry the secret burden of the living

name: cm_wolf_monologue_a_06
text: And keep a world of chaos clinging to a semblance of balance.
text_simple: and keep a world of chaos clinging to a semblance of balance

name: cm_wolf_monologue_a_07
text: Or, failing that, decide when the next age of ice begins.
text_simple: or failing that decide when the next age of ice begins

name: cm_wolf_monologue_b_01
text: To those who think my tutelage a prize, cold realization awaits.
text_simple: to those who think my tutelage a prize cold realization awaits

name: cm_wolf_monologue_b_02
text: You win nothing by coming here.
text_simple: you win nothing by coming here

name: cm_wolf_monologue_b_03
text: A lonely glacier for your home.
text_simple: a lonely glacier for your home

name: cm_wolf_monologue_b_04
text: A mountain of books your only friend.
text_simple: a mountain of books your only friend

name: cm_wolf_monologue_b_05
text: And when you have endured all I have to teach you...
text_simple: and when you have endured all i have to teach you

name: cm_wolf_monologue_b_06
text: The fate of an entire world of warmblood kin will rest in your weary hands.
text_simple: the fate of an entire world of warmblood kin will rest in your weary hands

name: cm_wolf_monologue_c_01
text: To master my lessons requires ages.
text_simple: to master my lessons requires ages

name: cm_wolf_monologue_c_02
text: Years longer than most mortals live.
text_simple: years longer than most mortals live

name: cm_wolf_monologue_c_04
text: And those who touch the power of the Blueheart will endure.
text_simple: and those who touch the power of the blueheart will endure

name: cm_wolf_monologue_c_05
text: Strong enough to suffer long, lonely lives -- a step out of time.
text_simple: strong enough to suffer long lonely lives a step out of time

name: cm_wolf_monologue_c_06
text: And when their frost watch has ended...
text_simple: and when their frost watch has ended

name: cm_wolf_monologue_c_07
text: They will join with me for a well-earned, eternal sleep.
text_simple: they will join with me for a wellearned eternal sleep

name: cm_wolf_monologue_d_01
text: If they so choose, my students may find their own pupils.
text_simple: if they so choose my students may find their own pupils

name: cm_wolf_monologue_d_02
text: Those they believe I might accept for further training.
text_simple: those they believe i might accept for further training

name: cm_wolf_monologue_d_03
text: But even amongst the adepts, true candidates are few.
text_simple: but even amongst the adepts true candidates are few

name: cm_wolf_monologue_d_04
text: Most wither under my gaze immediately.
text_simple: most wither under my gaze immediately

name: cm_wolf_monologue_d_05
text: Or, at best, survive a number of days before rasping a final breath.
text_simple: or at best survive a number of days before rasping a final breath

name: cm_wolf_monologue_d_06
text: I do not relish their passing. Nor do I feel sorrow.
text_simple: i do not relish their passing nor do i feel sorrow

name: cm_wolf_monologue_d_07
text: In the darkness and the cold, one finds only...indifference to organic life.
text_simple: in the darkness and the cold one finds only indifference to organic life

name: cm_wolf_move_04
text: I touch the earth through will alone.
text_simple: i touch the earth through will alone

name: cm_wolf_nova_kill_01

name: cm_wolf_nova_kill_02
pretty_criteria: Killing a hero with Crystal Nova (30% chance)

name: cm_wolf_nova_kill_03
text: I did not give you permission to leave.
text_simple: i did not give you permission to leave

name: cm_wolf_nova_kill_04
text: The unprepared often perish in the snow.
text_simple: the unprepared often perish in the snow

name: cm_wolf_nova_kill_05
pretty_criteria: Killing a hero with Crystal Nova (30% chance)

text: A wounded animal staggered by the snow.
text_simple: a wounded animal staggered by the snow

name: cm_wolf_nova_kill_07
text: We found the weakness inside you.
text_simple: we found the weakness inside you

name: cm_wolf_nova_kill_08
text: Let the scavengers pick at your bits.
text_simple: let the scavengers pick at your bits
pretty_criteria: Killing a hero with Crystal Nova (30% chance)

name: cm_wolf_outpost_capture_02
text: Our enemies will find no refuge here.
text_simple: our enemies will find no refuge here

name: cm_wolf_purch_01
text: It seems I accept your terms.
text_simple: it seems i accept your terms

name: cm_wolf_purch_03
text: I care not to bargain. Tell me your price.
text_simple: i care not to bargain tell me your price

name: cm_wolf_purch_04
text: But why do you covet this gold?
text_simple: but why do you covet this gold

name: cm_wolf_respawn_01
text: I have never failed to reappear.
text_simple: i have never failed to reappear

name: cm_wolf_respawn_04
text: This will only make me stronger.
text_simple: this will only make me stronger

name: cm_wolf_respawn_07
text: Perhaps a misstep. Or cunning calculation.
text_simple: perhaps a misstep or cunning calculation

name: cm_wolf_rival_001
text: You believed the mist brought you power. Now you learn. Your misery only begins.
text_simple: you believed the mist brought you power now you learn your misery only begins

name: cm_wolf_rival_003
text: You try tricks in the face of my power?
text_simple: you try tricks in the face of my power

name: cm_wolf_rival_005
text: Your paradise might come. But not by your hand.
text_simple: your paradise might come but not by your hand

name: cm_wolf_rival_007
text: Your mind was broken early. I send your body to follow.
text_simple: your mind was broken early i send your body to follow

name: cm_wolf_rival_008
text: Hatred doesn't burn hot enough to save you.
text_simple: hatred doesnt burn hot enough to save you

name: cm_wolf_rival_009
text: This is necessary, ancient one. To meet your own ends.
text_simple: this is necessary ancient one to meet your own ends

name: cm_wolf_rival_011
text: Your brain wasn't empty. Merely small and full.
text_simple: your brain wasnt empty merely small and full

name: cm_wolf_rival_013
text: Your delights delude you, Bane. Now cold reality sets in.
text_simple: your delights delude you bane now cold reality sets in

name: cm_wolf_rival_015
text: Wings only ice over in my realm.
text_simple: wings only ice over in my realm

name: cm_wolf_rival_017
text: Your beasts were noble. But not nearly stout enough.
text_simple: your beasts were noble but not nearly stout enough

name: cm_wolf_rival_019
text: You find nothing here but frost and fury.
text_simple: you find nothing here but frost and fury

name: cm_wolf_rival_021
text: None who know of me would bother with such a petty means as you.
text_simple: none who know of me would bother with such a petty means as you

name: cm_wolf_rival_023
text: Those like you are blind to the value of austerity.
text_simple: those like you are blind to the value of austerity

name: cm_wolf_rival_029
text: The ice takes your body, your days of glory forgotten.
text_simple: the ice takes your body your days of glory forgotten

name: cm_wolf_rival_031
text: We will not blame you for what you are. But mercy will not stand.
text_simple: we will not blame you for what you are but mercy will not stand

name: cm_wolf_rival_032
text: Even chaos must diminish in the cold.
text_simple: even chaos must diminish in the cold

name: cm_wolf_rival_033
text: Fool. Do you confuse me for a thrall?
text_simple: fool do you confuse me for a thrall

name: cm_wolf_rival_037
text: Brittle metal to match your bones.
text_simple: brittle metal to match your bones

name: cm_wolf_rival_045
text: The stars are much too far away to warm you.
text_simple: the stars are much too far away to warm you

name: cm_wolf_rival_047
text: Even in Nothl, cold blows cold.
text_simple: even in nothl cold blows cold

name: cm_wolf_rival_049
text: The cold hand of death was warm all along.
text_simple: the cold hand of death was warm all along

name: cm_wolf_rival_051
text: The echoes of thunder fade in drifting snows...
text_simple: the echoes of thunder fade in drifting snows

name: cm_wolf_rival_053
text: Bear this chill to the depths of every hell.
text_simple: bear this chill to the depths of every hell

name: cm_wolf_rival_055
text: The glow of your fire fades...
text_simple: the glow of your fire fades

name: cm_wolf_rival_057
text: Your gifts could hardly be called magic.
text_simple: your gifts could hardly be called magic

name: cm_wolf_rival_059
text: Earth splits easily when left to freeze.
text_simple: earth splits easily when left to freeze

name: cm_wolf_rival_065
text: You were a tiny candle, raging against an impossible storm.
text_simple: you were a tiny candle raging against an impossible storm

name: cm_wolf_rival_067
text: Not even the fires of the fae could save you.
text_simple: not even the fires of the fae could save you

name: cm_wolf_rival_069
text: You who understood true cold...should never have tested my mettle.
text_simple: you who understood true cold should never have tested my mettle

name: cm_wolf_rival_071
text: The first snows fall on the expanse of Clasz.
text_simple: the first snows fall on the expanse of clasz

name: cm_wolf_rival_073
text: What can you paint with solid ink?
text_simple: what can you paint with solid ink

name: cm_wolf_rival_075
text: The skies are much too cold for soaring.
text_simple: the skies are much too cold for soaring

name: cm_wolf_rival_077
text: If only you had friends to gather for warmth...
text_simple: if only you had friends to gather for warmth

name: cm_wolf_rival_081
text: You may be unkillable in essence, but your manifestations can surely die.
text_simple: you may be unkillable in essence but your manifestations can surely die

name: cm_wolf_rival_083
text: You abuse my gifts, Invoker. No more.
text_simple: you abuse my gifts invoker no more

name: cm_wolf_rival_085
text: Yours was a dangerous balance. Destined to die.
text_simple: yours was a dangerous balance destined to die

name: cm_wolf_rival_089
text: The world wanted warmth from you. You barely provided light.
text_simple: the world wanted warmth from you you barely provided light
pretty_criteria: Killing Keeper of the Light (25% chance)

name: cm_wolf_rival_090
text: An ancient light... Bereft of wisdom.
text_simple: an ancient light bereft of wisdom
pretty_criteria: Killing Keeper of the Light (25% chance)

name: cm_wolf_rival_091
text: You should have started with an icebreaker...
text_simple: you should have started with an icebreaker

name: cm_wolf_rival_093
text: Discipline hid your shivers, but the cold still stole your breath.
text_simple: discipline hid your shivers but the cold still stole your breath

name: cm_wolf_rival_095
text: The world tires of your spite.
text_simple: the world tires of your spite

name: cm_wolf_rival_097
text: They ask why I did not kill you sooner. All comes due in time.
text_simple: they ask why i did not kill you sooner all comes due in time

name: cm_wolf_rival_101
text: Your sister towers above you, child.
text_simple: your sister towers above you child

name: cm_wolf_rival_103
text: Your sickness of mind has twisted your form.
text_simple: your sickness of mind has twisted your form

name: cm_wolf_rival_105
text: Spirit bears have no flesh to warm you...
text_simple: spirit bears have no flesh to warm you

name: cm_wolf_rival_107
text: The ice in your heart finds a fitting home.
text_simple: the ice in your heart finds a fitting home

name: cm_wolf_rival_109
text: A beautiful form. Wasted on you.
text_simple: a beautiful form wasted on you

name: cm_wolf_rival_113
text: I had no wish to see you suffer. But your choice was made.
text_simple: i had no wish to see you suffer but your choice was made

name: cm_wolf_rival_115
text: The fires of war have burned too brightly. May your death bring peace.
text_simple: the fires of war have burned too brightly may your death bring peace

name: cm_wolf_rival_123
text: I'm no god, Wu Kong. Your mischief means nothing here.
text_simple: im no god wu kong your mischief means nothing here

name: cm_wolf_rival_133
text: For endless ages, I've quietly hoped for your death.
text_simple: for endless ages ive quietly hoped for your death

name: cm_wolf_rival_134
text: Cold and darkness are friends to me, too.
text_simple: cold and darkness are friends to me too

name: cm_wolf_rival_139
text: There are limits for even the most powerful beings, Omniknight. Those who claim omniscience are peddling lies.
text_simple: there are limits for even the most powerful beings omniknight those who claim omniscience are peddling lies

name: cm_wolf_rival_151
text: Even the fires of heaven die amidst this storm.
text_simple: even the fires of heaven die amidst this storm

name: cm_wolf_rival_179
text: Nothing but a waste of potential...
text_simple: nothing but a waste of potential

name: cm_wolf_rival_193
text: I must confess, Raijin. You have never impressed me.
text_simple: i must confess raijin you have never impressed me

name: cm_wolf_rival_215
text: I expected your folly to kill you. What I did not expect was that I might take part.
text_simple: i expected your folly to kill you what i did not expect was that i might take part

name: cm_wolf_rival_231
text: Renowned for your wisdom... Who could have foreseen such a clueless end?
text_simple: renowned for your wisdom who could have foreseen such a clueless end

name: cm_wolf_rival_233
text: Nothing more tiresome than the hubris of the human mind.
text_simple: nothing more tiresome than the hubris of the human mind

name: cm_wolf_rival_237
text: Child of the wind no more.
text_simple: child of the wind no more

name: cm_wolf_rival_239
text: I allowed your residence in Icewrack. It seems I made a mistake...
text_simple: i allowed your residence in icewrack it seems i made a mistake

name: cm_wolf_rival_243
text: The souls you've stolen do not concern me. I merely don't like the look of your face.
text_simple: the souls youve stolen do not concern me i merely dont like the look of your face

name: cm_wolf_rival_245
text: Such hubris, Zeus. Lightning was never the most dangerous element of a storm.
text_simple: such hubris zeus lightning was never the most dangerous element of a storm

name: cm_wolf_scepter_02
text: Unexpected innovation from one so young...
text_simple: unexpected innovation from one so young

name: cm_wolf_spawn_01
text: Bow before the wisdom of Blueheart.
text_simple: bow before the wisdom of blueheart

name: cm_wolf_spawn_03
text: Amidst my winter, they dare not dream of spring.
text_simple: amidst my winter they dare not dream of spring
criteria: Spawn Iscrystalmaiden IsIceWolf|Custom Iscrystalmaiden IsIceWolfLoadoutSpawn|Select Iscrystalmaiden IsIceWolf IsCMWolfMonoGroup4 IsCMWolfMonoDone
pretty_criteria: Spawning|Spawning in the loadout|Rare IsCMWolfMonoGroup4 IsCMWolfMonoDone

name: cm_wolf_spawn_04
text: There is much I can teach you, should you survive...
text_simple: there is much i can teach you should you survive

name: cm_wolf_spawn_05
text: What would you ask of the Blueheart?
text_simple: what would you ask of the blueheart

name: cm_wolf_spawn_06
text: Should I choose it, ice will cover the world.
text_simple: should i choose it ice will cover the world

name: cm_wolf_spawn_07
text: I bring hard lessons none of you wish to learn.
text_simple: i bring hard lessons none of you wish to learn

name: cm_wolf_spawn_08
text: Only from your limited perspective is the glacier slow...
text_simple: only from your limited perspective is the glacier slow

name: cm_wolf_spawn_10
text: All they can do is huddle for warmth.
text_simple: all they can do is huddle for warmth

name: cm_wolf_spawn_11
text: I command the frozen storm. Seek no comfort here.
text_simple: i command the frozen storm seek no comfort here

name: cm_wolf_spawn_12
text: Are you worthy of my teachings?
text_simple: are you worthy of my teachings

name: cm_wolf_spawn_13
text: Those who seek my powers are wise enough to know they choose a life of burden.
text_simple: those who seek my powers are wise enough to know they choose a life of burden

name: cm_wolf_spawn_14
text: Mine is a song of ice and ire.
text_simple: mine is a song of ice and ire

name: cm_wolf_spawn_15
text: Their howls of agony will soon fill the air.
text_simple: their howls of agony will soon fill the air

name: cm_wolf_taunt_01
text: I sense this fight will break you.
text_simple: i sense this fight will break you

name: cm_wolf_taunt_02
text: Your fears are well founded. Surrender to the cold.
text_simple: your fears are well founded surrender to the cold

name: cm_wolf_teleport_01
pretty_criteria: Casting an ability Town Portal Scroll (50% chance)

name: cm_wolf_teleport_02
pretty_criteria: Casting an ability Town Portal Scroll (50% chance)

name: cm_wolf_wheel_all_01
text: What foolish thought gave rise to this?
text_simple: what foolish thought gave rise to this

name: cm_wolf_wheel_all_02
text: I knew you were not worthy...
text_simple: i knew you were not worthy

name: cm_wolf_wheel_all_03
text: What are we to do with this?
text_simple: what are we to do with this

name: cm_wolf_wheel_thanks_01
text: I owe you gratitude, not tribute.
text_simple: i owe you gratitude not tribute

name: cm_wolf_wheel_thanks_02
text: I will say thank you. But I recognize no debt.
text_simple: i will say thank you but i recognize no debt

name: cm_wolf_win_04
text: The glacier will grow to cover this world.
text_simple: the glacier will grow to cover this world

name: cm_wolf_win_05
text: So begins an age of ice.
text_simple: so begins an age of ice
